if test `grep -c /opt/modulefiles/applications /etc/profile.d/modules.csh` = 0; then echo 'setenv MODULEPATH /opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.csh fi if test `grep -c /opt/modulefiles/applications /etc/profile.d/modules.sh` = 0; then echo 'export MODULEPATH=/opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.sh fi
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/netcdf
#%Module1.0 set netcdfHome /opt/netcdf/3.6.2 set compiler [expr ! [catch {exec which icc} ignored] ? {"intel"} : \ ! [catch {exec which pgcc} ignored] ? {"pgi"} : {"gnu"}] set libsubdir [expr {$compiler} == {"gnu"} ? {""} : {"/$compiler"}] module-whatis "netcdf" module-whatis "Version: 3.6.2" module-whatis "Description: netcdf" module-whatis "Compiler:$compiler" prepend-path PATH $netcdfHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $netcdfHome/lib$libsubdir prepend-path LIBPATH $netcdfHome/lib$libsubdir
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "3.6.2"
#%Module1.0 set netcdfHome /opt/netcdf/4.0.1 set compiler [expr ! [catch {exec which icc} ignored] ? {"intel"} : \ ! [catch {exec which pgcc} ignored] ? {"pgi"} : {"gnu"}] set libsubdir [expr {$compiler} == {"gnu"} ? {""} : {"/$compiler"}] module-whatis "netcdf" module-whatis "Version: 4.0.1" module-whatis "Description: netcdf" module-whatis "Compiler:$compiler" prepend-path PATH $netcdfHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $netcdfHome/lib$libsubdir prepend-path LIBPATH $netcdfHome/lib$libsubdir
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "4.0.1"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/netcdf/.version.4.0.1 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/netcdf/.version
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/nco
#%Module1.0 set ncoHome /opt/nco set compiler [expr ! [catch {exec which icc} ignored] ? {"intel"} : \ ! [catch {exec which pgcc} ignored] ? {"pgi"} : {"gnu"}] set libsubdir [expr {$compiler} == {"gnu"} ? {""} : {"/$compiler"}] module-whatis "nco" module-whatis "Version: 3.9.8" module-whatis "Description: nco" module-whatis "Compiler:$compiler" prepend-path PATH $ncoHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $ncoHome/lib$libsubdir prepend-path LIBPATH $ncoHome/lib$libsubdir
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "3.9.8"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/nco/.version.3.9.8 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/nco/.version
